title: My Bluetooth and Wi-fi disconnect automatically, and don't work anymore. I have to reboot the phone.
content: Everyday, doesn't matter where we are, my Wi-Fi stops working, and I just realize when I see that I'm using my network data. At the same time my Bluetooth disconnect and I receive a error message saying that the Bluetooth connection stoped. I have to reboot my phone everytime it happens.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
